00098         {
00099                 throw "[optGrid::init] A default initialization is impossible for the grid optimizer.";

00107         void init(int params, double min, double max, int nodes)
00108         {
00109                 numberOfValues.resize(params, false);
00110                 nodeValues.resize(params, nodes, false);
00111                 int i, j;
00112                 for (j=0; j<params; j++)
00113                 {
00114                         for (i=0; i<nodes; i++)
00115                         {
00116                                 nodeValues(j, i) = min + i * (max - min) / (nodes - 1.0);
00117                         }
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 
00126         void init(int params, const Array<double>& min, const Array<double>& max, const Array<int>& nodes)
00127         {
00128                 int i, j;
00129                 int nmax = 0;
00130                 for (i=0; i<params; i++) if (nodes(i) > nmax) nmax = nodes(i);
00131                 numberOfValues.resize(params, false);
00132                 nodeValues.resize(params, nmax, false);
00133                 for (j=0; j<params; j++)
00134                 {
00135                         for (i=0; i<nodes(j); i++)
00136                         {
00137                                 nodeValues(j, i) = min(j) + i * (max(j) - min(j)) / (nodes(j) - 1.0);
00138                         }
00139                 }
00140         }
00141 
00145         void init(int params, const Array<double>& values)
00146         {
00147                 int d = values.dim(0);
00148                 int i, j;
00149                 numberOfValues.resize(params, false);
00150                 numberOfValues = d;
00151                 nodeValues.resize(params, d, false);
00152                 for (j=0; j<params; j++)
00153                 {
00154                         for (i=0; i<d; i++)
00155                         {
00156                                 nodeValues(j, i) = values(i);
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 
00165         void init(int params, const Array<int>& nodes, const Array<double>& values)
00166         {
00167                 if (params != nodes.dim(0) || params != values.dim(0))
00168                         throw "[ConcatenatedModel::AppendModel] Dimension conflict";
00169 
00170                 numberOfValues = nodes;
00171                 nodeValues = values;
00172         }
00173 
00177         double optimize(Model& model, ErrorFunction& errorfunction, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00178         {
00179                 int params = numberOfValues.dim(0);
00180                 Array<int> index(params);
00181                 index = 0;
00182                 int i;
00183                 double e;
00184                 double best = 1e100;
00185                 Array<double> best_param(params);
00186 
00187                 // loop through all grid points
00188                 while (true)
00189                 {
00190                         // define the parameters
00191                         for (i=0; i<params; i++) model.setParameter(i, nodeValues(i, index(i)));
00192 
00193                         // evaluate the model
00194                         if (model.isFeasible())
00195                         {
00196                                 e = errorfunction.error(model, input, target);
00197                                 if (e < best)
00198                                 {
00199                                         best = e;
00200                                         for (i=0; i<params; i++) best_param(i) = model.getParameter(i);
00201                                 }
00202                         }
00203 
00204                         // next index
00205                         for (i=params-1; i>=0; i--)
00206                         {
00207                                 index(i)++;
00208                                 if (index(i) == numberOfValues(i))
00209                                 {
00210                                         index(i) = 0;
00211                                 }
00212                                 else break;
00213                         }
00214                         if (i == -1) break;
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 // write the best parameters into the model
00218                 for (i=0; i<params; i++) model.setParameter(i, best_param(i));
00219         }
00220 
00221 protected:
00223         Array<int> numberOfValues;
00224 
00227         Array<double> nodeValues;
00228 };

00280         void init(Model& model, const Array<double>& min, const Array<double>& max)
00281         {
00282                 SIZE_CHECK(min.ndim() == 1);
00283                 SIZE_CHECK(max.ndim() == 1);
00284 
00285                 int d, dc = min.dim(0);
00286                 SIZE_CHECK(max.dim(0) == dc);
00287                 RANGE_CHECK(model.getParameterDimension() >= dc);
00288 
00289                 minimum = min;
00290                 maximum = max;
00291 
00292                 step.resize(dc, false);
00293                 std::vector<unsigned int> D(dc);
00294                 for (d=0; d<dc; d++)
00295                 {
00296                         model.setParameter(d, 0.5 * (min(d) + max(d)));
00297                         step(d) = 0.25 * (max(d) - min(d));
00298                         D[d] = 5;
00299                 }
00300 
00301                 landscape.resize(D, false);
00302                 landscape = 1e100;
00303         }
00304 
00309         double optimize(Model& model, ErrorFunction& errorfunction, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00310         {
00311                 SIZE_CHECK(step.ndim() == 1);
00312                 SIZE_CHECK(minimum.ndim() == 1);
00313                 SIZE_CHECK(maximum.ndim() == 1);
00314 
00315                 int d, dc = step.dim(0);
00316                 bool bNew;
00317                 double value;
00318                 double e, best = 1e99;
00319                 std::vector<unsigned int> index(dc);
00320                 std::vector<unsigned int> best_index(dc);
00321                 Array<double> best_param(dc);
00322                 Array<double> old_param(dc);
00323 
00324                 SIZE_CHECK(minimum.dim(0) == dc);
00325                 SIZE_CHECK(maximum.dim(0) == dc);
00326                 RANGE_CHECK(model.getParameterDimension() >= dc);
00327 
00328                 // initialize variables
00329                 for (d=0; d<dc; d++)
00330                 {
00331                         value = model.getParameter(d);
00332                         old_param(d) = value;
00333                         best_param(d) = value;
00334                         index[d] = 0;
00335                         best_index[d] = 2;
00336                 }
00337 
00338                 // loop through the grid
00339                 while (true)
00340                 {
00341                         // compute the grid point,
00342                         // define it as the model parameters
00343                         // and check whether the computation
00344                         // has to be done at all
00345                         bNew = true;
00346                         e = landscape(index);
00347 
00348                         if (e < 1e100) bNew = false;
00349                         else
00350                         {
00351                                 // set the parameters
00352                                 for (d=0; d<dc; d++)
00353                                 {
00354                                         value = old_param(d) + (index[d] - 2.0) * step(d);
00355                                         if (value < minimum(d) || value > maximum(d)) bNew = false;
00356                                         model.setParameter(d, value);
00357                                 }
00358                         }
00359 
00360                         // evaluate the grid point
00361                         if (bNew)
00362                         {
00363                                 if (model.isFeasible())
00364                                 {
00365                                         e = errorfunction.error(model, input, target);
00366                                         landscape(index) = e;
00367                                 }
00368                         }
00369 
00370                         // remember the best solution
00371                         if (e < best)
00372                         {
00373                                 best = e;
00374                                 for (d=0; d<dc; d++)
00375                                 {
00376                                         best_index[d] = index[d];
00377                                         best_param[d] = old_param(d) + (index[d] - 2.0) * step(d);
00378                                 }
00379                         }
00380 
00381                         // move to the next grid point
00382                         for (d=0; d<dc; d++)
00383                         {
00384                                 index[d]++;
00385                                 if (index[d] <= 4) break;
00386                                 index[d] = 0;
00387                         }
00388                         if (d == dc) break;
00389                 }
00390 
00391                 // zoom into the error landscape array
00392                 Array<double> zoomed = landscape;
00393                 std::vector<unsigned int> zoomed_index(dc);
00394                 for (d=0; d<dc; d++) zoomed_index[d] = 0;
00395                 // loop through the grid
00396                 while (true)
00397                 {
00398                         // if appropriate, copy the error landscape point
00399                         for (d=0; d<dc; d++)
00400                         {
00401                                 if ((zoomed_index[d] & 1) == 1) break;
00402                                 index[d] = best_index[d] + (zoomed_index[d] / 2) - 1;
00403                                 if (index[d] > 4) break;
00404                         }
00405                         if (d == dc) zoomed(zoomed_index) = landscape(index);
00406                         else zoomed(zoomed_index) = 1e100;
00407 
00408                         // move to the next grid point
00409                         for (d=0; d<dc; d++)
00410                         {
00411                                 zoomed_index[d]++;
00412                                 if (zoomed_index[d] <= 4) break;
00413                                 zoomed_index[d] = 0;
00414                         }
00415                         if (d == dc) break;
00416                 }
00417                 landscape = zoomed;
00418 
00419                 // decrease the step sizes
00420                 for (d=0; d<dc; d++) step(d) *= 0.5;
00421 
00422                 // load the best parameter configuration into the model
00423                 for (d=0; d<dc; d++) model.setParameter(d, best_param(d));
00424 
00425                 // return the lowest error value archieved
00426                 return best;
00427         }
00428 
00429 protected:
00431         Array<double> minimum;
00432 
00434         Array<double> maximum;
00435 
00437         Array<double> step;
00438 
00463         Array<double> landscape;
00464 };

00501         void init(Array<double>& values)
00502         {
00503                 nodes = values;

00509         double optimize(Model& model, ErrorFunction& errorfunction, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00510         {
00511                 int t, tc = nodes.dim(0);
00512                 int p, pc = nodes.dim(1);
00513                 double e;
00514                 double best = 1e100;
00515                 int best_index = -1;
00516 
00517                 // loop through all points
00518                 for (t=0; t<tc; t++)
00519                 {
00520                         // define the parameters
00521                         for (p=0; p<pc; p++) model.setParameter(p, nodes(t, p));
00522 
00523                         // evaluate the model
00524                         if (model.isFeasible())
00525                         {
00526                                 e = errorfunction.error(model, input, target);
00527                                 if (e < best)
00528                                 {
00529                                         best = e;
00530                                         best_index = t;
00531                                 }
00532                         }
00533                 }
00534 
00535                 // write the best parameters into the model
00536                 for (p=0; p<pc; p++) model.setParameter(p, nodes(best_index, p));
00537         }
00538 
00539 protected:
00541         Array<double> nodes;
00542 };
